name: CompliancePosterCompany
0:
”Alexa, open Compliance Poster Company”
”Alexa, ask Compliance Poster Company for the latest update”
”Alexa, start Compliance Poster Company”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: compliance poster company
des:
Keep your human resources staff up to date on labor law changes from across the US. Listen to the latest updates from Compliance Poster Company's dedicated legal research staff to find out about updates to minimum wage laws and other labor law changes.

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
